Stalkers, beware! A %s has been sighted %s. Move cautiously, this one is a real threat.
Warning to all stalkers! The %s has been spotted %s. Best avoid the area if you value your life.
Heads up, stalkers! A %s is causing chaos %s. Steer clear until things settle down.
Attention stalkers! There has been a sighting of a %s %s. If you are heading that way, watch your back.
Urgent news! A %s has been seen prowling %s. It is highly aggressive, so stay alert.
Be careful, stalkers! A %s has been seen %s. Keep your distance or be prepared to fight.
Warning! A %s has been sighted %s. It is aggressive and unpredictable, so keep your guard up.
Stalkers, listen up! A %s is prowling %s. Avoid the area if you are not equipped to handle it.
Heads up, stalkers! A %s has been seen %s. Keep your distance if you want to live.
Alert to all stalkers! A %s has been spotted %s. It is unpredictable, so be prepared for the worst.
Be advised, stalkers! A %s has been seen lurking %s. Stay alert and stay alive.
Stalkers, beware! A %s has been spotted %s. Steer clear or face the consequences.
Urgent alert! A %s has been sighted %s. Avoid the area if possible.
Warning! A %s has been spotted prowling %s. Keep your distance it is a deadly one.
Stalkers, the %s is still lurking %s. Word has it, there is a hefty cash reward for anyone who takes it down. Stay vigilant.
The %s remains active %s. A local trader has put a price on its head. Take it down, and you might be looking at a serious payday. Proceed with caution.
No sign of the %s leaving its territory %s. A bounty has been posted for the brave soul who kills it. Avoid the area if you are not up for the challenge.
Reports confirm the %s is still causing havoc %s. Some stalkers have pooled together a cash reward for whoever ends it. Stay sharp, stalkers.
The %s is still on the loose %s. Rumor has it that the faction leaders are offering good money to whoever takes it out. Exercise extreme caution.
The %s continues to roam %s. A rich loner has promised a fat reward to anyone who finishes it off. Apparently, he lost a few friends to this one. Stalkers, stay alert.
Updates confirm the %s remains a threat %s. A call has gone out over the radio; whoever brings it down will get their reward. Move carefully.
The %s is still out there %s. A collector is offering cold cash to anyone who ends its rampage. Watch your backs, stalkers.
Sightings of the %s continue %s. Local traders are offering money to anyone who makes sure it will not trouble the Zone again. Avoid the area for now.
Stalkers, the %s has not left its position %s. A stash of cash is up for grabs to the first one who can bring it down. Keep your distance if you are not interested.
Word among stalkers is that the %s is still prowling %s. A reward awaits anyone who dares to challenge it. Be prepared for a tough fight.
The %s continues to terrorize the area %s. Reports suggest a cash reward for taking it down. Approach with caution, stalkers.
Stalkers have reported that the %s remains a danger %s. There is a bounty for the hunter who can eliminate it. Keep your weapons ready.
The %s has not left %s, and a sizable bounty is up for anyone willing to take it down. Stalkers, keep your wits about you.
Rumor has it that the %s still prowls %s. Some traders in the zone are paying handsomely for its head. Proceed with care.
Sightings suggest the %s is holding its ground %s. Word of a bounty has spread, but so have stories of those who tried and failed. Stay safe.
The %s is still being spotted %s. A wealthy trader is offering a reward to anyone who can bring it down. Watch your step.
Stalkers say the %s continues to cause trouble %s. A reward has been posted for anyone daring enough to face it. Do not get careless.
It seems the %s is not going anywhere %s. A bounty awaits the first stalker brave enough to take it down. Keep your distance if youre not prepared.
Reports indicate the %s is holding its ground %s. A reward has been posted for anyone willing to end its threat. Approach with caution.
Attention, stalkers! The %s has been taken down %s. The area is now secure.
Great news, everyone! The %s has been eliminated %s. The threat is no more!
Stalkers, rejoice! The %s has been dispatched %s. You can breathe easier now.
Reports confirm the %s has been defeated %s. The danger has passed!
Victory announcement! The %s has been killed %s. Thanks to those who fought bravely!
Heads up, stalkers! The %s has been eliminated %s. The area is safe once again.
Stalkers, the threat is over! The %s was taken out %s. Proceed with caution.
Urgent notice: the %s is no longer a danger %s. All clear in the area!
The %s has been vanquished %s. Thanks to all who contributed to the fight!
The %s has been defeated %s. The zone is now safer for all stalkers.
Good news, stalkers! The %s has been eliminated %s. Stay vigilant but feel free to explore.
Attention! The %s has been neutralized %s. Let us keep the area secure!
Stalkers, the %s has been killed %s. The threat has been dealt with effectively.
Victory is ours! The %s has been defeated %s. Great job, team!
The %s is no longer a concern %s. Thanks for your efforts, stalkers!
You hear about that new freak roaming around? They are calling it %s... Real nasty, they say.
Saw a shadow the other night. Did not get a good look, but the whispers call it %s.
Some stalker swears he saw a %s. Says it moved like nothing he has ever seen before.
Heard some rookie blabbering about a %s. Might just be nerves, but better keep your gun close.
Ever hear of a %s before? They say it has eyes like a flashlight. Real spooky stuff.
The Zone has a new surprise for us. %s, they are calling it. Like we did not have enough problems.
A loner came back from a run, kept rambling about a %s. Poor guy looked like he had seen a ghost.
One of the mercs says they took down a %s. Claims it took more bullets than a bloodsucker.
They say the %s can mimic other sounds. Got a few stalkers thinking their buddies were still alive.
Ran into a trader who is paying extra for info on a %s. If you spot one, might be worth the risk.
Heard a scream last night. Some say it was a %s. But who knows? The Zone is always screaming.
Word is, if you see a %s, you do not live long enough to tell about it. Careful out there, stalker.
They say the %s is hunting in packs now. Hope they are wrong about that.
Met a guy who heard a strange growl. He thinks it was a %s, but he did not stick around to find out.
The word going around is that the %s is faster than a dog. Better watch your back.
Some stalkers think the %s is drawn to campfires. They have been putting theirs out early.
A hunter told me he found tracks that did not match any mutant he knew. Must be a %s.
Ever seen the eyes of a %s at night? A loner claims they glow bright blue. Gives me the chills.
A veteran says he heard the %s can climb trees. If true, no place is safe anymore.
Got a tip from a trader. He says the %s leaves behind a strange smell. Like burnt metal.
The Zone keeps making new horrors. This %s thing is just another nightmare to add to the list.
I have heard the %s is silent when it moves. Like a ghost. Makes me uneasy.
A few stalkers are betting on who will be the first to bring back a trophy from a %s. My money is on none of them.
Some believe the %s is only active at night. Better stay in the light if you hear something strange.
Rumor has it the %s is smart, too. Like it knows when to ambush you.
A stalker found deep scratches on the rocks. He says it could only be from a %s.
You know the Zone. If it has a name like %s, it is bad news for all of us.
%s claims he barely escaped from a %s after a fierce fight in %s.
They say %s was seen battling a %s near %s. He is lucky to be alive.
Rumors say %s tried to take down a %s but it almost went wrong at %s.
Stalker %s reported being ambushed by a %s somewhere around %s.
After hearing gunfire, they found %s struggling with a %s at %s.
A few stalkers say %s was last seen shooting at a %s while at %s.
Reports are coming in that %s barely survived an attack by a %s at %s.
Some claim %s wounded a %s but could not finish the job near %s.
A wounded %s stumbled back to camp saying he fought a %s near %s.
There is talk of %s having a close call with a %s somewhere around %s.
They say %s managed to scare off a %s but it did not seem too hurt at %s.
Word is that %s fired a few shots at a %s while out at %s.
A few are saying %s was caught off guard by a %s while traveling through %s.
They say %s got into trouble with a %s but slipped away at %s.
Looks like %s ran into a %s, barely got away while at %s.
They found %s with a few scratches after an encounter with a %s around %s.
Somebody heard %s shouting about a %s during his run through %s.
Whispers say %s faced down a %s before making it back from %s.
Stalkers found %s bandaging up after a fight with a %s at %s.
Looks like %s put up a fight with a %s but had to retreat near %s.
Rumors are spreading that %s got chased by a %s while exploring %s.
Some say %s managed to wound a %s but it got away near %s.
Word is %s lost some gear after a scuffle with a %s in %s.
Reports of %s engaging a %s are spreading around from the area near %s.
Stalkers heard %s shouting about a %s before losing him at %s.
Word around is that %s had to fend off a %s during his trip through %s.
They say %s shot at a %s but did not stick around to see if it fell at %s.
Rumors say %s got into a firefight with a %s while near %s.
Whispers in camp mention %s getting into trouble with a %s over at %s.
They spotted %s stumbling back after a run-in with a %s somewhere around %s.
Stalker %s says he barely survived an attack from a %s when he was passing through %s.
Reports are coming in that %s traded shots with a %s near %s.
They say %s crossed paths with a %s while scouting around %s.
Some claim %s got a good look at a %s before it chased him through %s.
Looks like %s had a tough time escaping a %s while over at %s.
They found %s with a torn jacket after running from a %s in %s.
Reports say %s scared off a %s but is not sure if it will return to %s.
Word is that %s barely held off a %s before retreating from %s.
A few heard %s cursing about a %s after his encounter at %s.
They say %s managed to slow down a %s but it is still lurking near %s.
Whispers are going around that %s got spooked by a %s in the area of %s.
Stalkers saw %s limping back from a fight with a %s somewhere in %s.
Some say %s took a few shots at a %s but had to run for cover at %s.
Word is %s got too close to a %s while exploring around %s.
A few claim %s tried to track a %s but it disappeared into the shadows near %s.
They say %s managed to survive a run-in with a %s while on his way through %s.
Reports of %s getting surprised by a %s are spreading among those near %s.
Rumors are saying %s had to use a lot of ammo to fend off a %s at %s.
